item.title: Input Source
item.description: The input source controls which port is displayed in the secondary view. To set the secondary input source, click Input Source. NOTICE No other sources are available for systems with a connected ORA SYSTEM™. In the View 2 panel, select one of the following: HDMI – Displays the input source from a connected ORA SYSTEM™. Composite – Displays the input source connected to the front panel composite connector.
